Title: Requires information made public by the state board of professional medical conduct and health information to be published in the 8 most spoken languages
Summary: Requires information made public by the state board of professional medical conduct and health information required to be made public by the department of health to be disseminated in both written and electronic form in the 8 languages that are most spoken in the state.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to information disseminated to the public by the state board of professional medical conduct and by the department of health relating to health information
